016
017package org.parboiled.buffers;
018
019import org.parboiled.common.IntArrayStack;
020import org.parboiled.errors.IllegalIndentationException;
021import org.parboiled.support.Chars;
022import org.parboiled.support.IndexRange;
023import org.parboiled.support.Position;
024
025import static imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions.checkArgument;
026
027/**
028 * Special, immutable InputBuffer implementation for indentation based grammars.
029 * <p>This InputBuffer collapses all space and tab characters at the beginning of a text line into either nothing (if
030 * the line has the same indentation level as the previous line), a special {@link Chars#INDENT} character (if the line
031 * has a greater indentation level than the previous line) or one or more {@link Chars#DEDENT} characters (if the line
032 * has a lower indentation level than the previous line).</p>
033 * <p>Blank lines (lines containing nothing but whitespace) are removed from the input and the buffer can, optionally,
034 * remove line comments (i.e. comments that start with a predefined character sequence and go to the end of the line).
035 * </p>
036 * <p>This means that the highest index of this InputBuffer is probably smaller than that of the original input text
037 * buffer, since all line indentations and blank lines have been collapsed. However, the implementation will make sure
038 * that {@link #getPosition(int)}, {@link #extract(int, int)}, etc. will work as expected and always return the
039 * "correct" result from the underlying, original input buffer.</p>
040 * <p>If the input contains illegal indentation the buffer throws an {@link org.parboiled.errors.IllegalIndentationException}
041 * during construction</p>
042 */
043public class IndentDedentInputBuffer implements InputBuffer {
044    private final DefaultInputBuffer origBuffer;
045    private final DefaultInputBuffer convBuffer;
046
047    private int[] indexMap; // maps convBuffer indices to origBuffer indices
048    private final boolean strict;
049    private final boolean skipEmptyLines;
050
051    /**
052     * Creates a new IndentDedentInputBuffer around the given char array. Note that for performance reasons the given
053     * char array is not defensively copied.
054     *
055     * @param input            the input text.
056     * @param tabStop          the number of characters in a tab stop.
057     * @param lineCommentStart the string starting a line comment or null, if line comments are not defined
058     * @param strict           signals whether the buffer should throw an {@link IllegalIndentationException} on
059     * "semi-dedents", if false the buffer silently accepts these
060     * @throws imagingbook.parboiled.errors.IllegalIndentationException
061     *          if the input contains illegal indentations and the strict flag is set
062     */
063    public IndentDedentInputBuffer(char[] input, int tabStop, String lineCommentStart, boolean strict) {
064        this(input, tabStop, lineCommentStart, strict, true);
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Creates a new IndentDedentInputBuffer around the given char array. Note that for performance reasons the given
069     * char array is not defensively copied.
070     *
071     * @param input            the input text.
072     * @param tabStop          the number of characters in a tab stop.
073     * @param lineCommentStart the string starting a line comment or null, if line comments are not defined
074     * @param strict           signals whether the buffer should throw an {@link IllegalIndentationException} on
075     * "semi-dedents", if false the buffer silently accepts these
076     * @param skipEmptyLines   signals whether the buffer should swallow empty lines
077     * @throws imagingbook.parboiled.errors.IllegalIndentationException
078     *          if the input contains illegal indentations and the strict flag is set
079     */
080    public IndentDedentInputBuffer(char[] input, int tabStop, String lineCommentStart, boolean strict,
081                                   boolean skipEmptyLines) {
082        this.strict = strict;
083        this.skipEmptyLines = skipEmptyLines;
084        checkArgument(tabStop > 0, "tabStop must be > 0");
085        checkArgument(lineCommentStart == null || lineCommentStart.indexOf('\n') == -1,
086                "lineCommentStart must not contain newlines");
087        origBuffer = new DefaultInputBuffer(input);
088        BufferConverter converter = new BufferConverter(tabStop,
089                lineCommentStart != null ? lineCommentStart.toCharArray() : null);
090        convBuffer = new DefaultInputBuffer(converter.builder.getChars());
091        indexMap = converter.builder.getIndexMap();
092    }
093
094    public char charAt(int index) {
095        return convBuffer.charAt(index);
096    }
097
098    public boolean test(int index, char[] characters) {
099        return convBuffer.test(index, characters);
100    }
101
102    public String extract(int start, int end) {
103        return origBuffer.extract(map(start), map(end));
104    }
105
106    public String extract(IndexRange range) {
107        return origBuffer.extract(map(range.start), map(range.end));
108    }
109
110    public Position getPosition(int index) {
111        return origBuffer.getPosition(map(index));
112    }
113
114    public int getOriginalIndex(int index) {
115        return map(index);
116    }
117
118    public String extractLine(int lineNumber) {
119        return origBuffer.extractLine(lineNumber);
120    }
121
122    public int getLineCount() {return origBuffer.getLineCount();}
123
124    private int map(int convIndex) {
125        if (convIndex < 0) return indexMap[0];
126        if (convIndex < indexMap.length) return indexMap[convIndex];
127        if (indexMap.length == 0) return 1;
128        return indexMap[indexMap.length - 1] + 1;
129    }
130
131    private class BufferConverter {
132        public final BufferBuilder builder = new BufferBuilder();
133        private final int tabStop;
134        private final char[] lineCommentStart;
135        private final IntArrayStack previousLevels = new IntArrayStack();
136        private int cursor = 0;
137        private char currentChar;
138
139        public BufferConverter(int tabStop, char[] lineCommentStart) {
140            this.tabStop = tabStop;
141            this.lineCommentStart = lineCommentStart;
142            this.currentChar = origBuffer.charAt(0);
143            build();
144        }
145
146        private void build() {
147            previousLevels.push(0);
148
149            // consume inital indent
150            int currentLevel = skipIndent();
151
152            // transform all other input
153            while (currentChar != Chars.EOI) {
154                int commentChars = skipLineComment();
155                if (currentChar != '\n' && currentChar != Chars.EOI) {
156                    builder.append(currentChar);
157                    advance();
158                    continue;
159                }
160
161                // register newline
162                builder.appendNewline(commentChars);
163                advance();
164
165                // consume line indent
166                int indent = skipIndent();
167
168                // generate INDENTS/DEDENTS
169                if (indent > currentLevel) {
170                    previousLevels.push(currentLevel);
171                    currentLevel = indent;
172                    builder.append(Chars.INDENT);
173                } else {
174                    while (indent < currentLevel && indent <= previousLevels.peek()) {
175                        currentLevel = previousLevels.pop();
176                        builder.append(Chars.DEDENT);
177                    }
178                    if (strict && indent < currentLevel) {
179                        throw new IllegalIndentationException(origBuffer, origBuffer.getPosition(cursor));
180                    }
181                }
182            }
183
184            // make sure to close all remaining indentation scopes
185            if (previousLevels.size() > 1) {
186                builder.append('\n');
187                while (previousLevels.size() > 1) {
188                    previousLevels.pop();
189                    builder.append(Chars.DEDENT);
190                }
191            }
192        }
193
194        private int skipIndent() {
195            int indent = 0;
196            loop:
197            while (true) {
198                switch (currentChar) {
199                    case ' ':
200                        indent++;
201                        advance();
202                        continue;
203                    case '\t':
204                        indent = ((indent / tabStop) + 1) * tabStop;
205                        advance();
206                        continue;
207                    case '\n':
208                        if (!skipEmptyLines) builder.appendNewline(0);
209                        indent = 0;
210                        advance();
211                        continue;
212                    case Chars.EOI:
213                        indent = 0;
214                        break loop;
215                    default:
216                        if (skipLineComment() == 0) break loop;
217                }
218            }
219            return indent;
220        }
221
222        private void advance() {
223            currentChar = origBuffer.charAt(++cursor);
224        }
225
226        private int skipLineComment() {
227            if (lineCommentStart != null && origBuffer.test(cursor, lineCommentStart)) {
228                int start = cursor;
229                while (currentChar != '\n' && currentChar != Chars.EOI) {
230                    advance();
231                }
232                return cursor - start;
233            }
234            return 0;
235        }
236
237        private class BufferBuilder {
238            private final StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
239            private final IntArrayStack indexMap = new IntArrayStack();
240
241            private void append(char c) {
242                indexMap.push(cursor);
243                sb.append(c);
244            }
245
246            private void appendNewline(int commentChars) {
247                indexMap.push(cursor - commentChars);
248                sb.append('\n');
249            }
250
251            public char[] getChars() {
252                char[] buffer = new char[sb.length()];
253                sb.getChars(0, sb.length(), buffer, 0);
254                return buffer;
255            }
256
257            public int[] getIndexMap() {
258                return indexMap.toArray();
259            }
260        }
261    }
262}
263
